lines.text: [after Moe shoves the door into Shemp]
Hey, why don't you watch where you're going?

[to Shemp]
Relax. I give you a hand as soon as I finish eating this jelly sandwich. I can't work on an empty stomach.
I'm hungry too and I haven't...
[Larry has slammed the top door in Moe's face]
I didn't know you were standing there, Moe. I wouldn't have slammed the door.

[to Larry]
Oh, *you* slammed it? That's all right. Hey, is that a dirty spot?
I either need a longer arm or a shorter wall.
How do you like that? No more jelly. I guess I'll have to eat cheese. Better get some bread.
